title: The Pro’s Closet TPC is Back
content:
With its assets just auctioned off in October, TPC is back under new ownership with the message:

“We took a bit of a spill, but TPC is back on track to being the destination for selling and buying pre-owned bikes. It will be a bit before we have bikes for sale, but our doors are open for sellers. If you have something to sell, please visit our Sell/Trade page and submit any bikes, frames, or wheels.”

Elshair Companies, a private investment firm, bought The Pro’s Closet (TPC) brand and its intellectual property and has hired former employees to lead them into the next stage of the online used bike selling platform.

We’ll update this post as events warrant.
